nan,in last 4 season we got janna(support) ,j4(top), elise(jungle) and morganna(mid). so it is turn of adc.
actually its j4 jungle and elise top, j4 use to be used in jungle (still is) and elise was meant to be a top laner

They conformed it a while back that the victorious skin was going to be an adc and seeing from this image, the most likely champion is going to be sivir
ello hell being a supp main sucks i won 7/10 of my provisionals and got bronze5

Really?!?!? I won 2 out of my 10 provisionals and got Bronze 2! There is definitely something going on with how they place summoners into ranks. I mean, just because you play support doesn't mean you should be placed in a lower elo. I feel for you man.

Its because they were bronze last season, when their mmr reset this year, it was a couple of tiers lower than where they were last year. It made it hard for you to get placed where you were last season, and extremely hard to be placed higher. if you are a ranked virgin, you start with a silver 4ish mmr and are placed from that depending on how many wins/losses you get, and what order you get them in.

Haha, yea I feel the pain. I'm a support main too and got B5 last season.This season i won 5/5 and got B4 purely because I got B5 last. One of my friends lost 8 and won 2 and he got B2. And that is pretty much why I don't that is pretty much why I don't play ranked......
I am also a support main, my average kda is 4-3-22, I won 7 out of 10 provisionals. bronze 4. Haven't been out of bronze since.
God, I made a bet that I would get from Bronze V to Plat V by the end of the year and so far I'm at Bronze IV, welp!
Ill see you in the battlefield then...
I got 39 days to get from Plat 3 to Diamond 5.
Honestly, I will not be surprised if this turns out to be Quinn. Totally sounds like something Riot would do.
Probably Sivir, she's had a huge impact on the competitive scene this season.
Is that Victorious Urgot?
Guys Its Victorious Urgot. Idiots

Definitely not {{champion:53}}  huehue

Aw jeez, I guess it's time to stop mucking about and finally get to diamond. Again. You don't realise how little time is left until you have to climb back up to where you want to be.

Good luck and half fun everyone. 

If you need some inspiration for that final push you might want to check out: https://oceisaniceplaceafterall.wordpress.com/
why only half fun?

Im so glad that i didnt give up after my provisional matches of rank. I ended up in Bronze 5 even though i was silver 1 last season and gold 5 is pre-season (that doesnt count) but meh, i kept playing and ended up in Gold 3 working my way towards Platinum. 

Moral is dont give up so easily when you have so much time to climb back up :)
39 days to get Silver V from Bronze 1
why climb down the ladder
Trying to get Gold V before season ends. I have 39 days to get from silver 4 to Gold V ;~;

still no tribunal system great, yes i'm not the best but i never understood why,if your team dies and feeds on purpose,i have suffer for it, or why in rank 1 person will do all work while rest just watch especially in bronze, gj on those who somehow got out bronze

You're in bronze V because you're bad. Your average CS on almost every champ you've played except 5 is less than 100. You're 4/23 w/l on LeBlanc with a 68.9 CS average. Every ELO gets feeders and trolls, but they're not in every game, and sometimes your opponent gets them and you get a free win to make up for the free loss. If you actually do get a feeder in every game on your team, then you're the feeder.
Its clearly victorious {{champion:6}}
